title: Client Lagg
body:
I am frequently disconnecting on the client only. When trying to hop in a game I get the disconnected with PVP.net and I'm almost 100% sure its not my firewall because I usually have it off (I only download from trusted sources) Also usually get a delay from the time everyone excepts the queue to the time were in pregame. Reinstalling did not fix this error please provide assistance.

Thank You
-manny1322

replies.body:
While this may not be due to any kind of firewall issues, the root cause may very well involve your connection.  Disconnects with PvP.net and delays usually happen when the PvP.net Servers and your computer have a hard time communicating.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  Every step there is crucial in hopefully resolving your issue.

Reply back if you are still having issues!
